text: Eadward king gret mine biscopas & mine eorles & ealle mine þeingnes on Wigercestrescire & on Glowercestrescire freondlice.

& icc kyþe eow þæt ic habbe gifen Criste & Sancte Petre into Westminstre Periscoran & Deorhyrst & eall þæt þer to byreð mid sace & mid socne, mid tolle and mid teame & mid infangeneþeofe, on stræte & of stræte, on wude & on felda & on eallan þingan swa full & swa forð swa hit me silfan on handa stod.

& ic hate & beode þæt ealle þa þeignas of þam landen hynenforð understanden to þan abbote & to þam munecan into þan minstre & ealle þa gerihte & þa cnaulæcunga þe to me belimpæð don Criste & Sancte Petre & þam gebroðeran for ic nelle geþafian þæt þer <ænig> man ænigne onstingc habbe buton se abbod & þa gebroðera to Sancte Petres niode.
